comments.body:
Hi!  I just found a mistake here. It must be
```
export class Collection extends ItemGroup<Item>
```
Could you please check this? Thank you!

I should dig into that more. I resigned when I saw that it is possible to have a `RequestAuthDefinition` shaped like that:
```
{
type: 'basic',
basic: ...,
oauth2: ...,
}
```

However, I'll take a deeper look into that. The approach you mentioned is way better üëç
@karol-maciaszek Did you get any change tf checking this out?

I'm quite unsure whether I should enforce the type so strictly.
Personally I would, but it won't be compatible with at least this example from Postman Collection SDK tests:
https://github.com/postmanlabs/postman-collection/blob/develop/examples/collection-v2.json#L301
Agreed, we'll keep it this way for now, thanks.
